@WolfKwondo @qldhealth If it kills me, I don’t care.

@WolfKwondo @qldhealth Booster is due next week (I had COVID in Jan and didn’t think it was right to have it right away…again every country has different policies…who is right?) I’m not going to hide from reinfection though. I intend to start overseas travel again. Life as normal. I’m through hiding.
@RBH58 @qldhealth Just try and protect yourself and your family. Wear a mask even if vaccinated. Try to do outdoors activities. The world has changed and we need to adapt our lives accordingly.

@WolfKwondo @qldhealth The US CDC and Israel’s health department are just two organisations maintaining this alleged “T Cell myth”. I seriously don’t know who to believe anymore. Peer reviewed academics don’t agree. We are going to have to live with this virus. Elimination looks impossible.
